author: littlebitsofeverything
title: This is and Symbolism Behind the Lotus Flower Tattoo
text:
Lotus plants are perfect and now have strong symbolic connections to a lot of Asian religions specifically throughout India. The lotus flower begins as a little flower down in the bottom of a pond...
